thread.title: US-South Korea joint drills to resume in April

title: US-South Korea joint drills to resume in April
text:
US-South Korea joint drills to resume in April Tuesday, March 20, 2018 - 01:20 
The US and South Korea have announced they'll be resuming their joint military exercises next month, even as preparations are underway for U.S. President Donald Trump's anticipated meeting with Kim Jong Un. Dhruv Tikekar reports.   
The US and South Korea have announced they'll be resuming their joint military exercises next month, even as preparations are underway for U.S. President Donald Trump's anticipated meeting with Kim Jong Un. Dhruv Tikekar reports.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/03/20/us-south-korea-joint-drills-to-resume-in?videoId=410546036&videoChannel=13423
